name: Chuckie Egg 2017
description: Run, jump, dodge, collect eggs! There's a new Harry in town as the popular platform game debuts on PC.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 2Ghz Intel/AMD Graphics: Intel HD 5000 / GTX 400 Series or Better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
